titles: This indenture made the [blank] between [blank] of the one party, and [blank] on the other party, witnesseth, that the said [blank] doth thereby covenant promise, and grant to and with the said [blank] his executors and assigns, from the day of the date hereof, until [blank] first and next arrival [blank] and after, for and during the term of [blank] years, to serve in such service and imployment, ...
notes: A form with the blanks filled in in MS.
